name: Movie Edit Pro Video Information File
summary: Learn about .AVD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Other temporary files created by MEP include .HDP and .H0 files for audio data.

description: Video clip data file created by Movie Edit Pro (MEP), a movie editing program; stores a reference to a video file as well as scene detection information for the video segment; built automatically when a movie file is imported into MEP.
